name: always-autorepeat
description: Always repeats the playing video again.

name: background-play
description: Enables playing music in the background.

name: block-audio-ads
description: Blocks audio ads in streams and VODs.

name: block-embedded-ads
description: Blocks embedded steam ads using services like TTV.lol or PurpleAdBlocker.

name: block-video-ads
description: Blocks video ads in streams and VODs.

name: client-spoof
description: Spoofs the YouTube or Vanced client to prevent playback issues.

name: codecs-unlock
description: Adds more audio codec options. The new audio codecs usually result in better audio quality.

name: comments
description: Hides components related to comments.

name: compact-header
description: Hides the music category bar at the top of the homepage.

name: copy-video-url
description: Adds buttons in player to copy video links.

name: custom-branding
description: Changes the YouTube launcher icon and name to your choice (defaults to ReVanced).

options.title: Application Name
options.description: The name of the application it will show on your home screen.

options.title: App Icon Path
options.description: A path containing mipmap resource folders with icons.

options.name: custom-video-buffer
options.description: Lets you change the buffers of videos.

options.name: custom-video-speed
options.description: Adds more video speed options.

options.title: Video speed granularity
options.description: The granularity of the video speeds. The higher the value, the more speeds will be available.

options.title: Minimum video speed
options.description: The minimum video speed.

options.title: Maximum video speed
options.description: The maximum video speed. Must be greater than the minimum video speed and smaller than 5.

options.name: debug-mode
options.description: Enables Twitch's internal debugging mode.

options.name: debugging
options.description: Adds debugging options.

options.title: App debugging
options.description: Whether to make the app debuggable on Android.

options.name: disable-ads
options.description: Disables ads in HexEditor.

options.name: disable-auto-captions
options.description: Disable forced captions from being automatically enabled.

options.name: disable-capture-restriction
options.description: Allows capturing Spotify's audio output while screen sharing or screen recording.

options.name: disable-fullscreen-panels
options.description: Disables video description and comments panel in fullscreen view.

options.name: disable-login-requirement
options.description: Do not force login.

options.name: disable-player-popup-panels
options.description: Disables panels from appearing automatically when going into fullscreen (playlist or live chat).

options.name: disable-shorts-on-startup
options.description: Disables playing YouTube Shorts when launching YouTube.

options.name: disable-zoom-haptics
options.description: Disables haptics when zooming.

options.name: downloads
options.description: Removes download restrictions and changes the default path to download to.

options.name: downloads
options.description: Enables downloading music and videos from YouTube.

options.name: dynamic-color
options.description: Replaces the default Twitter Blue with the users Material You palette.

options.name: enable-on-demand
options.description: Enables listening to songs on-demand, allowing to play any song from playlists, albums or artists without limitations. This does not remove ads.

options.name: enable-wide-searchbar
options.description: Replaces the search icon with a wide search bar. This will hide the YouTube logo when active.

options.name: exclusive-audio-playback
options.description: Enables the option to play music without video.

options.name: feed-filter
options.description: Filters tiktok videos: removing ads, removing livestreams.

options.name: fix-google-login
options.description: Allows logging in with a Google account.

choices.name: general-reddit-ads
choices.description: Removes general ads from the Reddit frontpage and subreddits.

choices.name: hdr-auto-brightness
choices.description: Makes the brightness of HDR videos follow the system default.

name: hide-ads
description: Hides ads.

name: hide-ads
description: Removes general ads.

name: hide-album-cards
description: Hides the album cards below the artist description.

name: hide-artist-card
description: Hides the artist card below the searchbar.

name: hide-autoplay-button
description: Hides the autoplay button in the video player.

name: hide-breaking-news-shelf
description: Hides the breaking news shelf on the homepage tab.

name: hide-captions-button
description: Hides the captions button on video player.

name: hide-cast-button
description: Hides the cast button in the video player.

name: hide-create-button
description: Hides the create button in the navigation bar.

name: hide-crowdfunding-box
description: Hides the crowdfunding box between the player and video description.

name: hide-email-address
description: Hides the email address in the account switcher.

name: hide-endscreen-cards
description: Hides the suggested video cards at the end of a video in fullscreen.

name: hide-floating-microphone-button
description: Hides the floating microphone button which appears in search.

name: hide-get-premium
description: Removes all "Get Premium" evidences from the avatar menu.

name: hide-info-cards
description: Hides info cards in videos.

name: hide-my-mix
description: Hides mix playlists.

name: hide-player-buttons
description: Adds the option to hide video player previous and next buttons.

name: hide-premium-navbar
description: Removes the premium tab from the navbar.

name: hide-recommended-users
description: Hides recommended users.

name: hide-seekbar
description: Hides the seekbar.

name: hide-shorts-button
description: Hides the shorts button on the navigation bar.

name: hide-subreddit-banner
description: Hides banner ads from comments on subreddits.

dependencies.name: hide-video-action-buttons
dependencies.description: Adds the options to hide action buttons under a video.

dependencies.name: hide-views-stats
dependencies.description: Hides the view stats under tweets.

dependencies.name: hide-watch-in-vr
dependencies.description: Hides the option to watch in VR from the player settings flyout panel.

dependencies.name: microg-support
dependencies.description: Allows YouTube ReVanced to run without root and under a different package name with Vanced MicroG.

dependencies.name: minimized-playback-music
dependencies.description: Enables minimized playback on Kids music.

dependencies.name: music-microg-support
dependencies.description: Allows YouTube Music ReVanced to run without root and under a different package name.

dependencies.name: music-video-ads
dependencies.description: Removes ads in the music player.

dependencies.name: old-quality-layout
dependencies.description: Enables the original video quality flyout in the video player settings

dependencies.name: open-links-externally
dependencies.description: Open links outside of the app directly in your browser.

dependencies.name: playback-speed
dependencies.description: Enables the playback speed option for all videos.

compatiblePackages.name: predictive-back-gesture
compatiblePackages.description: Enables the predictive back gesture introduced on Android 13.

compatiblePackages.name: premium-heading
compatiblePackages.description: Shows premium branding on the home screen.

compatiblePackages.name: promo-code-unlock
compatiblePackages.description: Disables the validation of promo code. Any code will work to unlock all features.

compatiblePackages.name: remember-playback-rate
compatiblePackages.description: Adds the ability to remember the playback rate you chose in the video playback rate flyout.

compatiblePackages.name: remember-video-quality
compatiblePackages.description: Adds the ability to remember the video quality you chose in the video quality flyout.

compatiblePackages.name: remove-ads
compatiblePackages.description: Removes all ads from the app.

compatiblePackages.name: remove-bootloader-detection
compatiblePackages.description: Removes the check for an unlocked bootloader.

compatiblePackages.name: remove-player-button-background
compatiblePackages.description: Removes the background from the video player buttons.

compatiblePackages.name: remove-root-detection
compatiblePackages.description: Removes the check for root permissions.

compatiblePackages.name: remove-root-detection
compatiblePackages.description: Removes the check for root permissions and unlocked bootloader.

compatiblePackages.name: remove-screenshot-restriction
compatiblePackages.description: Removes the restriction of taking screenshots in apps that normally wouldn't allow it.

compatiblePackages.name: return-youtube-dislike
compatiblePackages.description: Shows the dislike count of videos using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

compatiblePackages.name: seekbar-tapping
compatiblePackages.description: Enables tap-to-seek on the seekbar of the video player.

name: settings
description: Adds settings menu to Twitch.

name: show-deleted-messages
description: Shows deleted chat messages behind a clickable spoiler.

name: prime-unlock
description: unlocks prime features

name: premium-unlock
description: unlocks premium features

name: sim-spoof
description: Spoofs the information which is retrieved from the sim-card.

name: sponsorblock
description: Integrates SponsorBlock which allows skipping video segments such as sponsored content.
dependencies: Tell us which artists you like" card from the home screen.

name: theme
description: Applies a custom theme.

options.title: Background color for the dark theme
options.description: The background color of the dark theme. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Background color for the light theme
options.description: The background color of the light theme. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Dark theme seekbar color
options.description: The background color of the seekbar of the dark theme. Leave empty for default color.

options.name: unlock-paid-widgets
options.description: Unlocks paid widgets of the app

options.name: unlock-plus
options.description: Unlocks plus features.

options.name: unlock-premium
options.description: Unlocks premium features.

options.name: unlock-prime
options.description: Unlocks Nova Prime and all functions of the app.

options.name: unlock-pro
options.description: Unlocks all pro features.

options.name: unlock-pro
options.description: Unlocks pro features.

options.name: unlock-pro
options.description: Unlocks pro features.

options.name: unlock-pro
options.description: Unlocks pro features.

options.name: unlock-pro
options.description: Unlocks all pro features.

options.name: unlock-pro
options.description: Unlocks all pro features.

options.name: unlock-pro
options.description: Unlocks all pro features.

options.name: unlock-premium
options.description: Unlocks all premium features.

options.name: unlock-pro
options.description: Unlocks all professional features.

options.name: unlock-themes
options.description: Unlocks all themes.

options.name: unlock-pro
options.description: Unlocks pro features.

options.name: upgrade-button-remover
options.description: Removes the upgrade tab from the pivot bar.

options.name: video-ads
options.description: Removes ads in the video player.
